variance_contributors.root_cause: Higher than expected component failures including gearbox, generator, and blade issues requiring emergency repairs.
Additional subcontractor support needed for major component replacements and specialized repairs.
Increased spare parts consumption due to unexpected component failures and maintenance needs.

key_budget_priorities: Preventive maintenance to reduce unscheduled repairs
Staff training to improve in-house repair capabilities
cost_saving_measures: Implement predictive maintenance program to reduce unexpected failures
Negotiate long-term contracts with subcontractors for better rates
Optimize spare parts inventory based on failure patterns
